derivation: middle voice from G5228 (ὑπεραίρομαι) and G142 (ὑπεραίρομαι);
kjv_def: exalt self, be exalted above measure
strongs_def: to raise oneself over, i.e. (figuratively) to become haughty
outline:
1. to lift or raise up over some thing
  2. to lift one's self up, be exalted, be haughty
  3. to carry one's self haughtily to, behave insolently towards one
